name: jackett
description: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) works as a proxy server: it translates queries from apps (Sonarr, SickRage, CouchPotato, Mylar, etc) into tracker-site-specific http queries, parses the html response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping & translation logic - removing the burden from other apps.

env.description: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.
Allow Jackett to update inside of the container (currently recommended by Jackett and enabled by default)
Optionally specify additional arguments to be passed.

volumes.description: Where Jackett should store its config file.

readme-vars.project_blurb: [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}) works as a proxy server: it translates queries from apps (Sonarr, SickRage, CouchPotato, Mylar, etc) into tracker-site-specific http queries, parses the html response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping & translation logic - removing the burden from other apps.

param_env_vars.desc: Specify a timezone to use EG Europe/London.

param_volumes.desc: Where Jackett should store its config file.

opt_param_env_vars.desc: Allow Jackett to update inside of the container (currently recommended by Jackett and enabled by default)
Optionally specify additional arguments to be passed.

readme-vars.app_setup_block:
The web interface is at `<your-ip>:9117` , configure various trackers and connections to other apps there.
More info at [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}).

Disable autoupdates in the webui to prevent jackett crashing, the image is refreshed when new versions are released.

changelogs.desc: Allow user to optionally enable auto updates.
Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
Switch to net-core builds of jackett, not dependant on mono and smaller images.
Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
Ensure root ownership of Jackett files.
Switch to using inhouse mono baseimage, ubuntu xenial based.
Call python2 from edge main to satisfy new mono dependency.
Rebase to alpine linux for smaller image.

setup:
The web interface is at `<your-ip>:9117` , configure various trackers and connections to other apps there.
More info at [{{ project_name|capitalize }}]({{ project_url }}).

Disable autoupdates in the webui to prevent jackett crashing, the image is refreshed when new versions are released.
title: Jackett
